q: . Kyle Korver was mobbed by his wildly celebrating teammates. Boston players sat dazed on the bench. A third overtime was on deck. Allen Iverson simply pumped his fist, his face expressionless as if he expected it. Kyle Korver hit that big shot and I was thinking,` If he hit that shot, we've got to win it, he said. After Kyle Korver sent the game into a third overtime, Chris Webber delivered a clutch steal and secured the Philadelphia 76ers' 125-124 victory over the Celtics on Friday night.`` It was an amazing game,

No matter when an election is held to replace Lee, Kirsten Gillibrand is confident his district will be well represented. They have representation right now, through myself and Senator Chuck Schumer , every minute of every day. Senator Chuck Schumer and I are committed to making sure their voice in Washington is as strong as it's ever been. Kirsten Gillibrand also is continuing Lee's efforts towards helping the victims of Flight 3407. Lee pushed for tougher flight safety legislation after the crash and Kirsten Gillibrand said she will continue to do so.``

key given to Michael Vick . Richard Hunter showed the council a picture of his black pit bull Mel, used by Michael Vick as a bait dog to train fighting dogs before he was seized by authorities. On Saturday I was horrified to witness Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gleefully proclaiming that a power had been bestowed on him to give the man who tried to kill my dog a key to my city, Richard Hunter said. Richard Hunter called Dwaine Caraway 's action an embarrassment to the city`` rouge decision to besmirch the reputation of the city.''
